thread.section_title: Planet of the Vapes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Planet of the Vapes | planetofthevapes.com
thread.title: Michelle
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Michelle

author: Michelle
title: Michelle
text: Overall great company, have bought two vapes from them, Second Vape was better than first, but you get what you pay for and my first one was a cheaper one. Any issues I have had have been promptly replied to. In the process of sending back the first vape to have fixed or replaced. Very pleased with this company and their ability to take care of issues. Would recommend them anyday!
